definition: to move in a brusque or headlong manner
examples: flung out of the room in a rage

definition: to throw forcefully, impetuously, or casually
examples: flung herself down on the sofa
clothes were flung on the floor

definition: to cast as if by throwing
to place or send suddenly and unceremoniously (see unceremonious sense 2)
examples: was arrested and flung into prison

definition: an act or instance of flinging
a casual or brief love affair
